qa.question: What kind of computers do you customize?
qa.answer: All types! It could be for gaming, streaming, home, or office use. I build the best possible computer for the task and budget price

qa.question: How fast would I be able to get my order?
qa.answer: As fast as possible. It depends on the orders ahead of you and the complexity of the order.

qa.question: Do you build setups for standing desks?
What started Monast company?
qa.answer: I wanted to be my own boss and do something that I have passion for.

qa.question: How credible is your work?
qa.answer: I am transparent with all of my clients, I want you to keep coming back. When requests come, I communicate clearly and honestly to the customers. My goal is to bring comfort and satisfaction to my clients. The orders of PCs and mechanical keyboards are then assembled on Mixer, live on stream!
